ResearchProjectDef.label: soybean fermentation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Soybean fermentation is the process by which soybeans are submitted to a chemical breakdown by bacteria, yeasts, or other microorganisms, transforming into new products. This research gives access to the soy sauce fermenter.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->embraced ancient methods to ferment soybeans, unveiling flavors and nutrients hidden within
subject_story->innovated with the soy sauce fermenter, a tool to harness the transformative power of microorganisms
subject_gerund->fostering culinary innovation through the alchemy of soy fermentation
